title: Animated Watch Faces
summary: Over 100+ Beautiful Animations for your Smart Watch
description: The unique features of the app are:- All animations absolutely "Free".- Analog and Digital Dials- Option to choose from High Quality or Standard Quality Animated videos. Standard quality takes less than 30 seconds to load the animation on watch and High quality takes less than 90 seconds.- Digital dial text direction: Top, Center, Bottom- Over 20 Digital fonts availableNote : Only supports Android Wear Watches.(Watches like Samsung Gear, DZ09 ,Sony smartwatch are not supported)
descriptionHTML:
The unique features of the app are:

- All animations absolutely "Free".
- Analog and Digital Dials
- Option to choose from High Quality or Standard Quality Animated videos. Standard quality takes less than 30 seconds to load the animation on watch and High quality takes less than 90 seconds.
- Digital dial text direction: Top, Center, Bottom
- Over 20 Digital fonts available


Note : Only supports Android Wear Watches.
(Watches like Samsung Gear, DZ09 ,Sony smartwatch are not supported)
comments: The doesn't load watch faces and you can't see them on your phone
